00040 #define NORMAL_H

00042 #include <iostream>

00044 struct Vector3D;
00045 
00046 struct Normal
00047 {
00048     Normal( double dx = 0.0, double dy = 0.0, double dz = 0.0 );
00049     explicit Normal( const Vector3D& vector );
00050     ~Normal( ); 
00051     Normal& operator+=( const Normal& nRhs );
00052     Normal& operator-=( const Normal& nRhs );
00053     Normal& operator*=( double a );
00054     Normal& operator/=( double a );
00055     bool operator==( const Normal& norm ) const;
00056     double operator[]( int i ) const;
00057     double& operator[]( int i );   
00058     double LengthSquared( ) const;
00059     double Length( ) const;
00060 
00061     double x;
00062     double y;
00063     double z;
00064 };
00065
